body.p:
Campbellsville Ky
May 6th 1862
N. Gaither Jr,
Dear Sir

I send a petition to you to presesnt to the governor for the remission of a fine for carrying concealed a pistol, by Edward Garrett, of this county, -- I believe the case is one that the Executive ought to relieve, I am satisfied his statements are true -- You will please present the petition to The Governor and ask him to give it a favorable consideration, and if he thinks ^it^ consistant with his duty to remit the fine

Taylor Cir. Ct.
$50 } Weapons
Edwd Garrett
Issd May 13. 1862
